title: Virtual Literacy Education for Generation Z: TikTok-Style Chunked Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and comprehension of instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Practical offline workshops enabling pre-service/in-service teachers to effectively deliver virtual literacy education in science subjects

learning_goals: Design short video content (under 3 minutes) tailored to the learning characteristics of Generation Z.
Implement a science information evaluation and verification process as chunked learning modules for application in educational settings.
Create teaching and learning materials that enhance the ability to judge the reliability of scientific information using TikTok-style short videos.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
